commits.message: feat: add gamified preview at /game-preview with full demo flow
commits.author: shalombook

panels.title: Add gamified preview
panels.scene: A knight stands calmly while villagers cheer around a giant arcade machine labeled '/game-preview'. One villager is dressed as a pixelated dragon, another as a knight. Confetti rains down.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: It's...it's playable before we even BUY it?!

panels.title: Add gamified preview
panels.scene: Villagers are lined up to play the arcade machine. Some are crying tears of joy, others are high-fiving. One villager attempts to offer the knight gold, but he declines with a wave of his hand.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The game...it's beautiful! And the difficulty curve is *chef's kiss*

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It's balanced for 5 minutes of play.

panels.title: Add gamified preview
panels.scene: A villager kneels before the arcade machine, hands clasped in prayer. The screen shows a 'Game Over' message. Other villagers look on with reverence.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: I have tasted digital glory! I have known defeat! It is...perfect!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It loops after the first level.

panels.title: 1 commit. 1 Feature. Countless Tears.
panels.scene: The knight sits wearily on a rock, polishing his sword. In the background, villagers are erecting a shrine to the arcade machine, complete with offerings of gold and flowers.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Let us call this day 'Preview Day'! A day of joy and playable demos!
